name: The Expanse: A Telltale Series - Archangel Bonus Episode
storyline: Chrisjen Avasarala has the weight of worlds on her shoulders as she navigates threats to Earth and political opponents seeking to take her down, all while managing family drama on a day that will change her life forever.
summary: A bonus DLC episode for The Expanse announced as part of its Deluxe Edition and set to be released after the 5 episode story is finished in September.

videos.name: Announcement Trailer
videos.title: The Expanse: A Telltale Series - Archangel Bonus Episode Trailer
